name: Sky High Signs
description:
Oh no! Ace has shipwrecked on a desolate island in the middle of nowhere. Luckily, a lone shopkeep has a special sale on big, bright neon signs, assuming you can collect what he needs. 

 

Created for the “Amaze Me” GMS2 2021 game jam

 

Use glowing mushrooms, fairies and fireflies to traverse the island and discover a scenic mountain top, enchanted forest, and ancient ruins. 

 

Controls:

W to jump

AD to move

Spacebar to interact

I for inventory 

 

 

Credits:

Sound effects used from the following sites. 

 https://www.zapsplat.com

https://www.dreamstime.com/

https://www.freesoundslibrary.com
